trans-unit.source: Using the GetAddress.io UK Postcodes Extension | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Using the GetAddress.io UK Postcodes Extension | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Používání rozšíření GetAddress.io UK Postcodes | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Retrieve addresses for entities like customers, vendors, employees, and banks in the United Kingdom from the GetAddress.io service.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve addresses for entities like customers, vendors, employees, and banks in the United Kingdom from the GetAddress.io service.

target.mrk: Načtěte adresy pro entity, jako jsou zákazníci, dodavatelé, zaměstnanci a banky, ve Velké Británii ze služby GetAddress.io.

trans-unit.source: The GetAddress.io UK Postcodes Extension to Microsoft Business Central

seg-source.mrk: The GetAddress.io UK Postcodes Extension to Microsoft Business Central

target.mrk: Rozšíření GetAddress.io UK Postcodes pro Microsoft Business Central

trans-unit.source: The GetAddress.io UK Postcodes extension can save time and prevent mistakes when you enter addresses for entities like customers, vendors, bank accounts, and employees.

seg-source.mrk: The GetAddress.io UK Postcodes extension can save time and prevent mistakes when you enter addresses for entities like customers, vendors, bank accounts, and employees.

target.mrk: Rozšíření GetAddress.io UK Postcodes vám může ušetřit čas a zabránit chybám při zadávání adres pro entity, jako jsou zákazníci, dodavatelé, bankovní účty a zaměstnanci.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you're creating a customer, you just choose a postcode and [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] shows a list of addresses.

seg-source.mrk: For example, when you're creating a customer, you just choose a postcode and [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] shows a list of addresses.

target.mrk: Například, při vytváření zákazníka stačí vybrat PSČ a [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] zobrazí seznam adres.

trans-unit.source: Pick the address you want, and presto, the address fields are filled out.

seg-source.mrk: Pick the address you want, and presto, the address fields are filled out.

target.mrk: Vyberte požadovanou adresu a pole adresy budou vyplněna.

trans-unit.source: To use the GetAddress.io UK Postcodes extension when you enter an address

seg-source.mrk: To use the GetAddress.io UK Postcodes extension when you enter an address

target.mrk: Pro použití rozšíření GetAddress.io UK Postcodes při zadávání adresy

trans-unit.source: Under **Address**, choose **Look up address from postcode**.

seg-source.mrk: Under **Address**, choose **Look up address from postcode**.

target.mrk: Pod polem **Adresa** zvolte **Vyhledat adresu z PSČ**.

trans-unit.source: The **Look up address from postcode** option is available only if the **Country/Region Code** field is either empty, or contains **GB**.

seg-source.mrk: The **Look up address from postcode** option is available only if the **Country/Region Code** field is either empty, or contains **GB**.

target.mrk: Možnost **Vyhledat adresu z PSČ** je dostupná pouze pokud je pole **Kód země/oblasti ** prázdné, nebo obsahuje **GB**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Postcode Search** window, in the **Postcode** field, enter or choose the postcode.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Postcode Search** window, in the **Postcode** field, enter or choose the postcode.

target.mrk: V okně **Vyhledat PSČ** v poli **PSČ** zadejte nebo vyberte PSČ.

trans-unit.source: In the **Address Selection** window, choose the address.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Address Selection** window, choose the address.

trans-unit.source: If you know the street number, you can filter the addresses by entering some or all of the number in the **Delivery Point** field.

seg-source.mrk: If you know the street number, you can filter the addresses by entering some or all of the number in the **Delivery Point** field.

target.mrk: Pokud znáte číslo ulice, můžete adresy filtrovat zadáním části nebo celého čísla do pole **Místo dodání**.

trans-unit.source: [Set up the GetAddress.io UK Postal Code extension](LocalFunctionality/UnitedKingdom/uk-setup-postal-code-service.md)

seg-source.mrk: Set up the GetAddress.io UK Postal Code extension

target.mrk: Nastavení rozšíření GetAddress.io UK Postal Code
